charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the US Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 151 months; as to count I and 151 months as to ct 2; the sentence of ct 1 is to run concurrent with the sentence of ct 2; the dft is remanded to the custody of the US Marshal; Upon release from imprisonment, the dft shall be on supervised release for a term of 5 yrs on cts 1 and 5 yrs on ct 2; the term of ct 1 is to run concurrently with the term of ct 2; the dft shall not possess a firearm as defeined in 18:921; Special conditions of suepervision are imposed; a MSA of $100 is imposed; (1)

The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the US Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 151 months; as to count I and 151 months as to ct 2; the sentence of ct 1 is to run concurrent with the sentence of ct 2; the dft is remanded to the custody of the US Marshal; Upon release from imprisonment, the dft shall be on supervised release for a term of 5 yrs on cts 1 and 5 yrs on ct 2; the term of ct 1 is to run concurrently with the term of ct 2; the dft shall not possess a firearm as defeined in 18:921; Special conditions of suepervision are imposed; a MSA of $100 is imposed; (2)
